goals.description: Implement @dns and @proxy operators for DNS resolution and proxy management
goals.success_criteria: DNS queries can be performed and proxy settings can be managed

goals.description: Implement @vpn operator for VPN connection management
goals.success_criteria: VPN connections can be established, monitored, and terminated

goals.description: Implement @firewall operator for firewall rule management
goals.success_criteria: Firewall rules can be added, removed, and listed
